(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (NNP Tucked))
      (PP (IN in)
        (NP
          (NP (DT a) (JJ small) (NN corner) (NN coffeeshop))
          (PP (IN in)
            (NP (DT the) (NNP East) (NNP Coast))))))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (NP (DT an) (JJ elderly) (NN couple))
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WP who))
          (S
            (VP (VBP are)
              (ADVP (RB still))
              (VP (VBG making)
                (NP (NN chicken) (NN rice))
                (NP
                  (NP (DT the) (JJ same) (NN way))
                  (SBAR
                    (S
                      (NP (PRP they))
                      (VP (VBP have)
                        (VP (VBN been)
                          (PP (IN for)
                            (NP (CD 30) (NNS years))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(couple-14, Tucked-1)
prep(Tucked-1, in-2)
det(coffeeshop-6, a-3)
amod(coffeeshop-6, small-4)
nn(coffeeshop-6, corner-5)
pobj(in-2, coffeeshop-6)
prep(coffeeshop-6, in-7)
det(Coast-10, the-8)
nn(Coast-10, East-9)
pobj(in-7, Coast-10)
cop(couple-14, is-11)
det(couple-14, an-12)
amod(couple-14, elderly-13)
root(ROOT-0, couple-14)
nsubj(making-18, who-15)
aux(making-18, are-16)
advmod(making-18, still-17)
rcmod(couple-14, making-18)
nn(rice-20, chicken-19)
iobj(making-18, rice-20)
det(way-23, the-21)
amod(way-23, same-22)
dobj(making-18, way-23)
nsubj(been-26, they-24)
aux(been-26, have-25)
rcmod(way-23, been-26)
prep(been-26, for-27)
num(years-29, 30-28)
pobj(for-27, years-29)


(ROOT
  (SBAR (IN If)
    (S
      (NP (PRP you))
      (VP (VBP have)
        (ADVP (RB ever))
        (VP (VBD wondered)
          (SBAR
            (WHNP (WP what))
            (S
              (NP (NN chicken) (NN rice))
              (VP (VBN tasted)
                (PP (IN like)
                  (PP (IN in)
                    (NP (DT the) (JJ old) (NNS days))))
                (, ,)))))))))


mark(wondered-5, If-1)
nsubj(wondered-5, you-2)
aux(wondered-5, have-3)
advmod(wondered-5, ever-4)
root(ROOT-0, wondered-5)
dobj(tasted-9, what-6)
nn(rice-8, chicken-7)
nsubj(tasted-9, rice-8)
ccomp(wondered-5, tasted-9)
prep(tasted-9, like-10)
pcomp(like-10, in-11)
det(days-14, the-12)
amod(days-14, old-13)
pobj(in-11, days-14)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP you))
    (ADVP (RB better))
    (VP (VBP get)
      (ADJP (RB here) (JJ quick)))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(quick-5, you-1)
advmod(quick-5, better-2)
dep(quick-5, get-3)
advmod(quick-5, here-4)
root(ROOT-0, quick-5)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP
      (VP (VB cos)
        (NP (DT these) (JJ good) (JJ old) (NN mom)))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VB pop)
        (SBAR
          (S
            (NP (NNS shops))
            (VP (VBP are)
              (VP (VBG getting)
                (NP (NN rarer))))))))))


root(ROOT-0, cos-1)
det(mom-5, these-2)
amod(mom-5, good-3)
amod(mom-5, old-4)
dobj(cos-1, mom-5)
cc(cos-1, and-6)
conj(cos-1, pop-7)
nsubj(getting-10, shops-8)
aux(getting-10, are-9)
ccomp(pop-7, getting-10)
dobj(getting-10, rarer-11)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (ADVP (RB nowadays))
    (. .)))


root(ROOT-0, nowadays-1)
